CustomField.description: This is for the markets where we can only sell 1 client per Sub-Metro Area. This field is needed for reporting on the Sub-Metro level to roll up the number of clients in each Sub-Metro Area
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is for the markets where we can only sell 1 client per Sub-Metro Area. This field is needed for reporting on the Sub-Metro level to roll up the number of clients in each Sub-Metro Area
CustomField.label: Sub-Metro Area
